description: This file contains Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes related to template operations, including creation, update, and response representations.

classes.name: TemplateCreateRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new template, includes validation annotations.

classes.name: TemplateUpdateRequest
classes.description: DTO for updating an existing template.

classes.name: TemplateResponse
classes.description: DTO for returning template information in responses.
